text:
Funding Circle | Onsite London | Software Engineers all levels |Ruby, Clojure, Python, Polyglot approach

If you haven't heard of us try checking these out: https://bit.ly/2xfbCG0) https://bit.ly/2QwMH9A)

At Funding Circle we are developing a two-sided marketplace that allows small businesses to get access to the funds they need to grow.... Globally.

Building next Gen real-time systems with Kafka and Kafka streams.

Machine Learning software for, Anti Money Laundering and Risk Modelling to CRM systems and Automated Underwriting.

Scaling our core customer-facing platform.

Building a brand new Micro-service and Event-driven platform ready for global expansion.

Salary dependant on experience Apply here: https://jobs.jobvite.com/careers/funding-circle-uk/job/oCCE7...
